'''''"Sic Semper Tyrannis"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The Latin phrase {{Lang|la=''sic semper tyrannis''|la_tl=Thus always to tyrants|mini=1}} expresses the idea that those who abuse power are always eventually overthrown. It is variously thought to originate from the expulsion of {{w|Lucius Tarquinius Superbus}}, from {{w|Marcus Junius Brutus}} on the {{w|Assassination of Julius Caesar|assassination}} of {{w|Julius Caesar}}, or from {{w|Scipio Aemilianus}} on the assassination of {{w|Tiberius Gracchus}}.
